snippet.title: [FM-7] Boulder Dash バルダーダッシュ, Longplay - Stage 1 to 6 and Bonus Stage Completed (FUJITSU FM-7)
snippet.description:
This is FM-7 cassette tape version. I played up to stage 6 across the bonus stage. The magazine advertisement at that time was put in the opening of the video. The restless eye movement of Mr. Rockford is amusing.

Boulder Dash, First Star, COMPTIQ, 1984

Platforms:
FM-7, PC88, X1, Atari 8-bit, Arcade, Apple II, MSX, ZX Spectrum, Commodore 64, ColecoVision, NES, BBC Micro, Acorn Electron, IBM PC, Amstrad CPC, Amiga, iOS, Intellivision, Mac OS, Atari ST, Game Boy, Game Boy Advance, Nintendo DS, Nintendo 3DS, Android, PMD 85, Atari 2600, Nintendo Switch

#retrogaming #retrogames #レトロゲーム
Please subscribe to my channel as it is very encouraging!😄😄😄
